body: LEAD: RUVIN SCHWARTZ knows how to find other people's money. The company he heads is Coldata, a collection agency in Valley Stream, L.I. It does work for New York City's traffic and environmental agencies, getting money from those who have ignored city fines. RUVIN SCHWARTZ knows how to find other people's money.
